+0288: cdef inline void _lerp_x_discrete_multichannel_per_ch_border_feathered_kernel(
static CYTHON_INLINE void __pyx_f_10chromatica_6v2core_9interp_2d_15interp_2d_fast___lerp_x_discrete_multichannel_per_ch_border_feathered_kernel(__Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_l0, __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_l1, __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_c, __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_out_mv, __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_border_const_mv, __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_border_modes_mv, __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_distance_modes_mv, __pyx_t_10chromatica_6v2core_9interp_2d_15interp_2d_fast__f64 __pyx_v_border_feathering, Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_H, Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_W, Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_L, Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_C, CYTHON_UNUSED int __pyx_v_num_threads) {
  Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_h;
  Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_w;

                                  __pyx_v_edge_val = __pyx_f_10chromatica_6v2core_9interp_2d_15interp_2d_fast___interp_line_discrete_multichannel(__pyx_v_l0, __pyx_v_l1, __pyx_v_border_res.u_x_final, __pyx_v_border_res.u_y_final, __pyx_v_L, __pyx_v_ch);

+0349:                     if border_res.blend_factor > 0.0:

 0352:                     else:

static PyObject *__pyx_pf_10chromatica_6v2core_9interp_2d_15interp_2d_fast__lerp_between_lines_1ch_feathered(CYTHON_UNUSED PyObject *__pyx_self, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_line0, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_line1, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_coords, int __pyx_v_border_mode, __pyx_t_10chromatica_6v2core_9interp_2d_15interp_2d_fast__f64 __pyx_v_border_constant, __pyx_t_10chromatica_6v2core_9interp_2d_15interp_2d_fast__f64 __pyx_v_border_feathering, int __pyx_v_distance_mode, int __pyx_v_num_threads) {

  Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_W;
  int __pyx_v_n_threads;
  PyObject *__pyx_v_os = NULL;
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_l0 = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_l1 = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_c = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_out = 0;
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_out_mv = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  __Pyx_LocalBuf_ND __pyx_pybuffernd_coords;
  __Pyx_Buffer __pyx_pybuffer_coords;
  __Pyx_LocalBuf_ND __pyx_pybuffernd_line0;
  __Pyx_Buffer __pyx_pybuffer_line0;
  __Pyx_LocalBuf_ND __pyx_pybuffernd_line1;
  __Pyx_Buffer __pyx_pybuffer_line1;

 0368:     """
 0369:     Fast parallel single-channel interpolation between two lines with feathering support.
 0370:     
 0371:     Args:

 0376:         border_constant: Value for BORDER_CONSTANT mode

+0576: def lerp_between_lines_flat_multichannel_per_ch_border_feathered(
/* Python wrapper */

#else

#endif
); /*proto*/
PyDoc_STRVAR(__pyx_doc_10chromatica_6v2core_9interp_2d_15interp_2d_fast__6lerp_between_lines_flat_multichannel_per_ch_border_feathered, "\n    Flat multi-channel interpolation with per-channel border modes and feathering.\n    \n    Args:\n        line0: First line, shape (L, C)\n        line1: Second line, shape (L, C)\n        coords: Flat coordinates, shape (N, 2) - same for all channels\n        border_modes: Border mode for each channel, shape (C,)\n        border_constants: Border constant for each channel, shape (C,)\n        border_feathering: Feathering width\n        distance_mode: Distance metric - int for all channels, or array shape (C,)\n        num_threads: Number of threads (-1 = auto)\n    \n    Returns:\n        Interpolated values, shape (N, C)\n    ");
static PyMethodDef __pyx_mdef_10chromatica_6v2core_9interp_2d_15interp_2d_fast__7lerp_between_lines_flat_multichannel_per_ch_border_feathered = {"lerp_between_lines_flat_multichannel_per_ch_border_feathered", (PyCFunction)(void(*)(void))(__Pyx_PyCFunction_FastCallWithKeywords)__pyx_pw_10chromatica_6v2core_9interp_2d_15interp_2d_fast__7lerp_between_lines_flat_multichannel_per_ch_border_feathered, __Pyx_METH_FASTCALL|METH_KEYWORDS, __pyx_doc_10chromatica_6v2core_9interp_2d_15interp_2d_fast__6lerp_between_lines_flat_multichannel_per_ch_border_feathered};

 0767:     """
 0768:     Flat multi-channel interpolation with per-channel coordinates and border modes.
 0769:     
 0770:     Args:
 0771:         line0: First line, shape (L, C)
 0772:         line1: Second line, shape (L, C)
 0773:         coords: Per-channel flat coordinates, shape (C, N, 2)
 0774:         border_modes: Border mode for each channel, shape (C,)
 0775:         border_constants: Border constant for each channel, shape (C,)
 0776:         border_feathering: Feathering width
 0777:         distance_mode: Distance metric - int for all channels, or array shape (C,)
 0778:         num_threads: Number of threads (-1 = auto)

 0859: ):
 0860:     """
 0861:     Discrete x-sampling with per-channel border modes and feathering.
 0862:     
 0863:     Snaps u_x to nearest line index (no interpolation along x),
 0864:     interpolates continuously along y.
 0865:     
 0866:     Args:
 0867:         line0: First line, shape (L, C)
 0868:         line1: Second line, shape (L, C)
 0869:         coords: Coordinate grid, shape (H, W, 2)
 0870:         border_modes: Border mode for each channel, shape (C,)
 0871:         border_constants: Border constant for each channel, shape (C,)
 0872:         border_feathering: Feathering width
 0873:         distance_mode: Distance metric - int for all channels, or array shape (C,)

static PyObject *__pyx_pf_10chromatica_6v2core_9interp_2d_15interp_2d_fast__14lerp_between_lines_x_discrete_per_ch_coords_feathered(CYTHON_UNUSED PyObject *__pyx_self, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_line0, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_line1, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_coords, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_border_modes, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_border_constants, __pyx_t_10chromatica_6v2core_9interp_2d_15interp_2d_fast__f64 __pyx_v_border_feathering, PyObject *__pyx_v_distance_mode, int __pyx_v_num_threads) {
  Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_L;
  Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_C;
  Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_C_coords;
  Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_H;
  Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_W;
  PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_dm_arr = 0;
  int __pyx_v_n_threads;

 0952:     Discrete x-sampling with per-channel coordinates, border modes, and feathering.
 0953:     
 0954:     Args:

+1037: def lerp_between_lines_full_feathered(
/* Python wrapper */
static PyObject *__pyx_pw_10chromatica_6v2core_9interp_2d_15interp_2d_fast__17lerp_between_lines_full_feathered(PyObject *__pyx_self, 
#if CYTHON_METH_FASTCALL
PyObject *const *__pyx_args, Py_ssize_t __pyx_nargs, PyObject *__pyx_kwds
#else
PyObject *__pyx_args, PyObject *__pyx_kwds
#endif
); /*proto*/
PyDoc_STRVAR(__pyx_doc_10chromatica_6v2core_9interp_2d_15interp_2d_fast__16lerp_between_lines_full_feathered, "\n    Smart dispatcher for fast line interpolation with full feature support.\n    \n    Automatically selects the appropriate kernel based on input shapes.\n    Supports all combinations of:\n    - Single vs multi-channel\n    - Grid vs flat coordinates\n    - Same vs per-channel coordinates\n    - Global vs per-channel border modes\n    - Global vs per-channel distance modes\n    - Feathering support\n    \n    Args:\n        line0: First line, shape (L,) or (L, C)\n        line1: Second line, shape (L,) or (L, C)\n        coords: Coordinate array, shape:\n            - (H, W, 2) for grid\n            - (N, 2) for flat\n            - (C, H, W, 2) for per-channel grid\n            - (C, N, 2) for per-channel flat\n        border_mode: Border mode(s):\n            - int: Same for all channels\n            - list/array: Per-channel modes, shape (C,)\n        border_constant: Border constant(s):\n            - float: Same for all channels\n            - list/array: Per-channel constants, shape (C,)\n        border_feathering: Feathering width (0.0 = no feathering)\n        distance_mode: Distance metric(s) for 2D border computation:\n            - None: Use ALPHA_MAX (default)\n            - int: Same for all channels\n            - list/array: Per-channel modes, shape (C,)\n            Options: MAX_NORM, MANHATTAN, SCALED_MANHATTAN, ALPHA_MAX, \n                     ALPHA_MAX_SIMPLE, TAYLOR, EUCLIDEAN, WEIGHTED_MINMAX\n        num_threads: Number of threads (-1=auto, 0=serial, >0=specific)\n        x_discrete: If True, use discrete x-sampling (nearest neighbor in x)\n    \n    Returns:\n        Interpolated values\n    ");

  __Pyx_GOTREF(__pyx_t_9);

 1047: ):
 1048:     """
 1049:     Smart dispatcher for fast line interpolation with full feature support.
 1050:     
 1051:     Automatically selects the appropriate kernel based on input shapes.
 1052:     Supports all combinations of:
 1053:     - Single vs multi-channel
 1054:     - Grid vs flat coordinates
 1055:     - Same vs per-channel coordinates
 1056:     - Global vs per-channel border modes
 1057:     - Global vs per-channel distance modes
 1058:     - Feathering support
 1059:     
 1060:     Args:
 1061:         line0: First line, shape (L,) or (L, C)
 1062:         line1: Second line, shape (L,) or (L, C)
 1063:         coords: Coordinate array, shape:
 1064:             - (H, W, 2) for grid
 1065:             - (N, 2) for flat
 1066:             - (C, H, W, 2) for per-channel grid
 1067:             - (C, N, 2) for per-channel flat
 1068:         border_mode: Border mode(s):
 1069:             - int: Same for all channels
 1070:             - list/array: Per-channel modes, shape (C,)
 1071:         border_constant: Border constant(s):
 1072:             - float: Same for all channels
 1073:             - list/array: Per-channel constants, shape (C,)
 1074:         border_feathering: Feathering width (0.0 = no feathering)
 1075:         distance_mode: Distance metric(s) for 2D border computation:
 1076:             - None: Use ALPHA_MAX (default)
 1077:             - int: Same for all channels
 1078:             - list/array: Per-channel modes, shape (C,)
 1079:             Options: MAX_NORM, MANHATTAN, SCALED_MANHATTAN, ALPHA_MAX, 
 1080:                      ALPHA_MAX_SIMPLE, TAYLOR, EUCLIDEAN, WEIGHTED_MINMAX
 1081:         num_threads: Number of threads (-1=auto, 0=serial, >0=specific)
 1082:         x_discrete: If True, use discrete x-sampling (nearest neighbor in x)
 1083:     
 1084:     Returns:
 1085:         Interpolated values
 1086:     """
 1087:     cdef Py_ssize_t total_size
+1088:     cdef int use_threads = num_threads
  __pyx_v_use_threads = __pyx_v_num_threads;

 1089:     cdef Py_ssize_t C
 1090:     cdef np.ndarray[f64, ndim=1] bc_arr
 1091:     cdef f64 bc_scalar
 1092:     cdef np.ndarray[i32, ndim=1] bm_arr
 1093:     cdef np.ndarray[i32, ndim=1] dm_arr
 1094:     cdef int bm_scalar
 1095:     cdef int dm_scalar
